Beskrivelse: Apex Legends er et free-to-play Battle Royale-spill utviklet av Respawn Entertainment og publisert av Electronic Arts. Spillet ble lansert for Windows, PlayStation 4 og Xbox One den 4. februar 2019 uten noen form for annonsering eller reklamering av spillet.
Kategorier: Shooter
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Shooter

Beskrivelse:
In 2004, Michael Townley, Trevor Philips, and Brad Snider partake in a failed robbery in Ludendorff, North Yankton, resulting in the first being presumed dead. Nine years later, Michael lives with his family in the city of Los Santos under the alias Michael De Santa, having made a secret agreement with the Federal Investigation Bureau (FIB) agent Dave Norton to stay hidden. Across town, gangster Franklin Clinton is working for a corrupt car salesman and meets Michael while attempting to fraudulently repossess his son's car. The two later become friends. When Michael finds his wife sleeping with her tennis coach, he and Franklin chase the coach to a mansion, which Michael destroys in anger. The owner of the mansion, drug lord Martin Madrazo, demands compensation. Michael returns to a life of crime to obtain the money, enlisting Franklin as an accomplice. With the help of Michael's old friend Lester Crest, a disabled hacker, they rob a jewellery store to pay off the debt. Meanwhile, Trevor, who lives in squalor on the outskirts of Los Santos, hears of the heist and realises it was Michael's work; Trevor had believed Michael was killed in the Ludendorff heist. Trevor finds Michael and reunites with him, forcing Michael to reluctantly accept him back into his life.
\n
\nAs time goes on, the lives of the protagonists spiral out of control. Michael's criminal behaviour prompts his family to leave him. When he later becomes a movie producer, he comes into conflict with Devin Weston, a billionaire venture capitalist and corporate raider, who attempts to shut down Michael's studio. Michael thwarts his efforts and inadvertently kills his assistant, causing Devin to vow revenge. Meanwhile, Franklin must rescue his friend Lamar Davis from his former friend and rival gangster Harold "Stretch" Joseph, who attempts to kill them to prove himself to his new gang. Concurrently, Trevor attempts to consolidate his control over various black markets in Blaine County, waging war against The Lost outlaw motorcycle club, Latin American street gangs, rival meth dealers, private security firm Merryweather, and triad kingpin Wei Cheng.
\n
\nHaving broken his agreement with Dave by committing heists again, Michael is coerced by Dave and his superior, Steve Haines, to perform a series of operations alongside Franklin and Trevor to undermine the International Affairs Agency (IAA). Under Steve's direction and with Lester's help, they attack a convoy carrying funds for the IAA and steal an experimental chemical weapon from an IAA lab. As Steve comes under increasing scrutiny, he forces Michael and Franklin to erase evidence against him from the FIB servers. Michael takes the opportunity to wipe the data on his activities, destroying Steve's leverage over him.
\n
\nAfter reconciling with his family, Michael starts planning his final heist with Trevor, Franklin, and Lester: raiding the Union Depository's gold bullion reserve. However, Trevor discovers that Brad was not imprisoned as he was led to believe, but killed during the Ludendorff heist and buried in the grave marked for Michael. Deducing that he was supposed to be killed in Brad's place, Trevor feels betrayed and leaves Michael for dead following a standoff with Cheng's henchmen, causing friction within the group and threatening to undermine their plans. Meanwhile, Steve betrays Michael and Dave, and they become caught in a Mexican standoff between the FIB, the IAA, and Merryweather. Trevor aids Michael and Dave, feeling only he has the right to kill Michael, agreeing to perform the Union Depository heist with the latter and part ways afterward.
\n
\nThe heist is successful, but Franklin is afterwards approached by Steve and Dave, who contend that Trevor is a liability, and Devin, who seeks revenge on Michael. Franklin has three choices: kill Trevor, kill Michael, or attempt to save both in a suicide mission. Should Franklin choose to kill either Michael or Trevor, he ceases contact with the man he spares and returns to his old life. Otherwise, Michael and Trevor reconcile and the trio, aided by Lamar and Lester, withstands an onslaught from the FIB and Merryweather before going on to kill Cheng, Stretch, Steve, and Devin. The three protagonists cease working together but remain friends.
Kategorier: Shooter
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Shooter

Beskrivelse:
ARMA 3 is an open-world, realism-based, military tactical shooter video game developed and published by Bohemia Interactive exclusively through the Steam distribution platform.
\n
\nARMA 3 mainly takes place in the mid-2030s, on the fictional islands of Altis and Stratis in the Aegean Sea, and the South Pacific island of Tanoa, as well as the island of Malden and a landlocked terrain set in the historical region of Livonia. The islands feature photo-realistic terrain and water environments. Altis is the largest official terrain in the ARMA series with ground area covering approximately 270 square kilometres (100 sq mi). The smaller island, Stratis, expands over an area of 20 square kilometres (7.7 sq mi).
\n
\nThe single-player campaign has the player take control of U.S. Army soldier Corporal Ben Kerry. During the campaign, the player is placed in a variety of situations, from lone wolf infiltration missions to the commanding of large-scale armored operations. The player is able to choose different objectives and weaponry (such as UAVs, artillery, and air support) according to their play style.
\n
\nSince its initial release, the ARMA 3 platform has been actively maintained and extended by Bohemia Interactive and publishing partners with almost twenty significant game engine updates and downloadable content (DLC) releases, including most recently, in 2021, a major Vietnam War era DLC expansion S.O.G Prairie Fire.
\n
\nARMA 3 also has a very active modding community that has published nearly 100,000 mods, adding thousands of additional terrains, buildings, vehicles, weapons, placeable objects, missions, campaigns, and game mechanics enhancements, most of which are freely and easily available from the Steam Workshop.
\n
\nDespite its relative age, ARMA 3 maintains a substantial player community, often being in the top 50 games (by active players) on Steam, with hundreds of official and community multi-player servers, community groups, and many dedicated ARMA 3 mil-sim realism groups.
Kategorier: Tactical shooter
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Tactical shooter

Beskrivelse:
Test dine ferdigheter i 50 av de mest fotball-entusiastiske countires. Få FM 2019 og klatre til toppen med noen av de 2500 beste klubber i verden og lede ditt unike lag mot seier.

Sett deg selv i skoene til en leder for å lede et fotballag! Ikke bare styr strategien til laget ditt, men også ansett coachingpersonalet, motta reklamekontrakter, og bygg de beste fasilitetene til klubben.

I Football Manager 2019 er du forfatteren av suksessen. Definer taktikken og spillestilen, led ansettelsen av spillere for å designe det endelige laget. Ta over en aktiv rolle.

Trene og utvikle laget ditt, samt sluttføre viktige detaljer før de neste kampene dine. Og når dagen for kampen kommer, okkuperer du stedet på sidelinjen og overvåker prosessen mens spillerne krysser den magiske hvite linjen. Test din egen fotballvisjon! Football Manager-serien er en av de mest populære i historien, og sin appell har vart i flere tiår.
Kategorier: Sim Games, Indie Games, Adventure Games, Racing Games, Adventure, Simulation
Attributt 4 verdi(er): Nintendo Switch, Microsoft Windows, macOS, Klassisk MacOS
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Sim Games, Indie Games, Adventure Games, Racing Games, Adventure, Simulation

Beskrivelse:
Det første Far Cry spillet som dukket opp i 2004 var et stort sprang fremover for FPS-sjangeren. Et vakkert produkt med fantastisk grafikk som ser bra ut selv i dag. Siden da var hvert enkelt Far Cry-spill et synonym for realistisk grafikk. Far Cry 5 kommer til å ta deg for en tur til Hope County, Montana. Et idyllisk paradislignende sted, for tiden styrt av "frihets-elskende folk" kult, ledet av karismatisk leder Joseph Seed. Vil du være i stand til å beseire denne skurken, eller kanskje med sin søte snakk, vil han gjøre deg til et annet hjernevasket kultmedlem?
Utforsk en stor åpen verden

Far Cry 5 finner sted i Hope County, Montana. Hele fylket er åpent for deg. Hvor du går og hvilke steder du besøker er opp til deg. Ubisoft bestemte seg for å fjerne tårn og mini-kart fra Far Cry 5. Takket være dette vil du bli fullt nedsenket i dette vakre og rike miljøet. Bruk din trapper ferdigheter til å finne veien. Akkurat som i tidligere spill kan du temme vilt dyr å bruke dem i slaget. Det er mange forskjellige oppdrag og aktiviteter som du kan gjøre i Hope County. Skal du fullt ut forstå sin rikdom eller bare følge hovedhistorien? Det er opp til deg.
Vakker, realistisk grafikk

Far Cry 5 (PC) akkurat som sine forgjengere kommer til å ta pusten fra deg med en endret versjon av CryEngine. Du vil ikke kunne fortelle forskjellen mellom den virkelige verden og grafikken som presenteres i dette spillet. Hope County i Far Cry 5 ser ut som en ekte tilstand i moderne Montana. Et landlig fylke med store gårder, rene innsjøer og skoger, hvor du vil gjerne tilbringe ferien. Men du har jobb å gjøre. Ikke glem det og ta Joseph Seed i varetekt.
Velg fra et stort utvalg av forskjellige kjøretøy.

Hope County der historien om Far Cry 5 finner sted er enorm. Du kan ikke utforske den på dine føtter. Det er derfor du vil kunne bruke ulike kjøretøyer. Denne gangen er ikke bare biler, motorsykler eller båter til din disposisjon. Denne gangen kan du også reise med et fly. Håper du er ikke redd for høyder.
Kategorier: First-person shooter
Attributt 1 verdi(er): Ubisoft, Ubisoft Montreal, Ubisoft Toronto, Ubisoft Shanghai, Ubisoft Kyiv, Red Storm
Attributt 4 verdi(er): PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows, Stadia

Spillet består av et stort utvalg av kuber, også kalt blokker, som for eksempel jernmalm, trestubber, treplanker, jord, gress osv. Spillet har fem forskjellige moduser:

Beskrivelse:
Spillet fokuserer på urban byplanlegging og utbygging av veier og infrastruktur. Spilleren er borgermester og må oppfylle innbyggernes ønsker i tillegg til å balansere og prioritere hva som er best for byen i forhold til dens økonomiske situasjon. I Cities: Skylines kan spilleren bygge ut et transportnettverk, skoler og utdanning, kraftverk, politi- og brannstasjoner og andre viktige bygninger for å kunne drive en by.

Byen kan deles opp i flere bydeler slik at spilleren kan fokusere på forskjellige industrier og «politiske retninger.» Et område kan for eksempel markeres og velge at alle innbyggerne skal få røykvarslere installert. Dette vil føre til færre branner og til tross for at røykvarslene vil føre til økte kostnader kan dette være mer økonomisk enn å bygge flere brannstasjoner.

Etterhvert som byen vokser får spilleren tilgang til flere resurser, bygninger, områder og andre fordeler gjennom milepæler som oppnås iløpet av spillet.
Kategorier: Urban Construction Simulator, Tycoon Games, Manager Games, Simulation Game, Simulation, Strategy
Attributt 4 verdi(er): PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Xbox One, macOS, Microsoft Windows, Linux, Stadia, Mac OS
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Urban Construction Simulator, Tycoon Games, Manager Games, Simulation Game, Simulation, Strategy

Beskrivelse:
Gameplay follows an open world style, with players being essentially free to travel anywhere in their lorries, provided they can keep up with fuel, maintenance and toll costs, alongside fines if they incur any. When starting out, players choose their HQ's location in any of the game map's cities. At first, the player can only take what is known as quick jobs—these jobs involve making hired driver deliveries while employed by a delivery company, with a provided truck and all expenses (fuel, road tolls, ferry crossings) covered. As the player earns money or takes bank loans, they can eventually afford to buy themselves a truck, acquire a home garage, and start accepting better-paying jobs by using their own truck instead of being a driver for hire with gear being supplied. Money earned in the game can be spent on upgrading or purchasing new trucks, hiring NPC drivers to take on deliveries, buying more garages and expanding the home garage to accommodate more trucks and drivers. The skills of the drivers hired by the player also grow with experience and the player can create a huge fleet of the trucks and drivers expanding the business across Europe.

As players progress and earn money, they are also able to purchase their own trailers, which can be fully customized in the same way as trucks. Player-owned trailers can be used to receive and deliver cargo at existing storage locations. Like trucks, trailers can also be allocated to company employees, resulting in higher income.

The player gains experience points after each delivery. A skill point is awarded after each level-up. Skill points can be used to unlock deliveries that require different ADR classes, longer distance deliveries, special cargo loads, fragile cargo loads, deliveries that are urgent and eco-driving. This progression allows the player to take on better-paying jobs.

The base game features 71 cities in twelve countries, over twenty types of cargo and over fifteen fictional European companies. There are seven map DLCs that expand the game to more countries and locations, and multiple other truck and trailer DLCs.

The game also features a "Radio" feature, which allows players to play imported MP3 and OGG files. It also allows the player to listen to Internet radio.
Kategorier: Sim Games, Indie Games, Adventure Games, Racing Games, Adventure, Simulation
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Sim Games, Indie Games, Adventure Games, Racing Games, Adventure, Simulation

Beskrivelse:
American Truck Simulator is a truck driving simulator with business management elements. Players drive trailer-hooked trucks and deliver loads to a designated location in order to be compensated with money and experience points. The payload must be delivered to the destination speedily within a given amount of time, and with the least amount of damage to the goods as possible, in order to net the most money and experience points possible.
Driver's view from a Western Star 49X during gameplay

In-game money, after being earned, can be used to purchase more trucks and associated aesthetic, mechanical, and structural upgrades, purchase fuel and repairs for those trucks, take out and repay loans from a bank, as well as hire drivers and purchase garages to house and base them in. The amount of money and experience points earned is commensurate on the length of the delivery in distance traveled as well as the type of goods being transported. When delivering goods, players can use their own personally-purchased truck or use one provided by an in-game company. When delivering goods using a fleet-provided truck, repairs and other costs are paid for by the company rather than out of the player's in-game fund pool. Experience points can be accumulated and used to obtain perks, which improve the player's driving ability and what kinds of payloads they can deliver, such as chemicals and explosives, which net a bigger reward when completed successfully.

In addition to driving and delivering goods, the player can manage a trucking business with hired drivers and owned properties. Hired drivers will perform deliveries on their own, netting the player money. The longer the drivers are hired, the more skillful they will become, thus increasing the amount of money they earn from each delivery. The player can train each driver to focus on a specific area of their driving that can be improved upon. Unlike in Euro Truck Simulator 2, the game features weigh stations, where players must stop at a designated weigh station in order to determine the weight of the cargo before proceeding through (though the game will sometimes allow them to bypass the station, but avoiding it deliberately will result in a fine).
Kategorier: Sim Games, Indie Games, Adventure Games, Racing Games, Adventure, Simulation
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Sim Games, Indie Games, Adventure Games, Racing Games, Adventure, Simulation

Beskrivelse: In career mode, players takes on the roles of farmers. Their tasks depend on expanding and upgrading dated equipment and machinery, which can be achieved by harvesting and selling crops. Players are free to explore the surrounding areas of the map, grow from their choice of several crops, and invest their money in additional fields and equipment. They can also raise livestock or earn an income from forestry.

Beskrivelse: Bus Simulator 18 features a sizable map of a fictional modern city consisting of twelve districts, which is 2.5 times bigger than Bus Simulator 16. The game allows players to drive eight licensed vehicles from four different bus manufacturers including Iveco, MAN, Mercedes-Benz, and Setra ranging from low-floor buses to articulated buses. Like its predecessor, the game also uses a procedural generation system that requires players to complete different missions to unlock new districts. Management-wise, players are able to create their own bus lines, as well as buying, selling and upgrading buses.

Beskrivelse:
Scum

Verdens uslokkelig behov for underholdning har vendt seg mot blodtørst som underholdning Behemoth TEC1 er satt til Premiere sesong to av sine TV sensasjon SCUM. Denne nye sesongen flytter konkurransen fra den robuste, lukkede innendørs arenaer til frodige skoger, rullende felt, og robuste terreng av TEC1'egen private SCUM Island. Både fan favoritter og nye fanger vil sammenstøt i en hensynsløs krig for å overleve mens kjemper for støtte fra seere, produsenter og corporate sponsorer for berømmelse, gaver, og en sjanse til liv etter døden.

SCUM tar sikte på å utvikle multiplayer åpen verden overlevelse spill med enestående nivåer av karakter tilpasning, kontroll og progresjon, hvor kunnskap og ferdigheter er den ultimate våpen for langsiktig overlevelse. Kombinere metodisk planlegging og forvaltning av hardcore overlevelse med valgfri PvP'nettverk hendelser tilgjengelig for alle når som helst, SCUM streik en unik balanse mellom komplekse simulering og intens action i neste generasjon av overlevelse Spillet.

SCUM er bygget med Unreal Engine 4 og vil utvides gjennom Early Access-perioden. Fans kan følge detaljer om utvikling med ukentlige dev blogger på scumgame.com og på Twitter @SCUMgame.

FUNKSJONER [ALPHA]

Kompleks simulering: SCUM benytter dusinvis av komplekse systemer for å tillate spillere å gå så dypt som de velger i forvaltningen av deres karakter. Spillere kan fordype deg i minutia av overlevelse erfaring gjennom systemer kontrollere deres karakter metabolisme, treghet under bevegelse, og selv hvor fort lag av klær tørr på og av kroppen. Djevelen er i detaljene...

Massive landskap: Traverse og utforske 144 kvadratkilometer med terreng som inkluderer tett skog, pittoreske strender, Serene felt, forlatte byer, og trekk flyplasser. I utgangspunktet vil den massive terrenget bli håndtert til fots og som utvikling fortsetter biler vil bli innført for raskere bevegelse.

PvP nettverkshendelser: Angi TEC1's pågående nettverkshendelser med et klikk på en knapp og bli revet til lukkede områder av øya for hvit-knoke PvP gameplay. Volunteer for et arrangement og bli satt opp mot andre fanger med berømmelse poeng og høy verdi tyvegods på linjen for de som overlever.

Utvide gameplay: mens den nåværende versjonen av SCUM inkluderer allerede grunnleggende laging, kamp, og tilpasning systemer, vil featureset og gameplay kontinuerlig utvides til å omfatte mer avansert mekanikk, mer variasjon i gameplay, og en metanarrative for spillere å fullføre oppdrag med håp om en dag å få av øya...

Online multiplayer: overleve med opptil 64 spillere per server med mulighet til å leie din egen server rett fra i spillet menyen.

VEIKART FOR TIDLIG TILGANG

FUNKSJONER I DAGENS SPILL
Følgende funksjoner er tilgjengelige i spillet som det er tilgjengelig nå. Vennligst fortsette å sjekke dette området og Steam fora for oppdateringer til featuresets og tilføyelser gjennom Early Access perioden.

Støtte for flerspiller & Single Player
Nettverk Events [Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, Cargo Assault]
NPCer [droner, skiltvakt roboter, dukker]
Innenlandske og ville dyr
Vær + dag tid simulering
Tre miljø typer [Middelhavet, kontinentet, dinariske alpene]
Avansert metabolisme system
Inventar system
RPG Character tilpasning
Grunnleggende Visual Character tilpassing [tatoveringer]
Tegn utjevning system [erfaringspoeng]
Grunnleggende laging system [Skill basert]
Grunnleggende bevegelses system + vaulting
Basic Combat system [ubevæpnet, melee våpen, skytevåpen]
Fullt realistisk bullet fysikk
Animal Tracking og jakt system
Grunnleggende Fame Point System
Grunnleggende Team System
Grunnleggende Shelter respawn system
Stemmechat
Kategorier: Survival Games, Action Games, Indie Games, Massively Multiplayer, Adventure, Early Access
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Survival Games, Action Games, Indie Games, Massively Multiplayer, Adventure, Early Access

Beskrivelse:
Jalopy

Før du setter av på veien, må du forberede bilen. Ditt kjøretøy er den fiktive Laika 601 Deluxe, basert på det virkelige liv Trabbie produsert i Øst-Tyskland som pleide å ha en kultstatus blant brukerne tilbake i kommunistiske ganger. Du må praktisk talt sette hele bilen sammen og bestemme hvilke elementer som skal brukes. Alt vil saken senere. Elementene du velger å montere vil kreve ulike vedlikeholdsarbeider og vil reflektere i bilens ytelse på veien. Denne delen av spillet kan være en virkelig godbit for alle bil elskere.
Naviger på veien

Det er en simulering spill som du blir en driver av Laika og må ta vare på alle aspekter av bilen. Din reise vil kreve navigering gjennom tøffe værforhold og ulike overflater som gjørme. På veien, må du bytte dekk eller fikse bilen og gjøre annet vedlikehold fungerer. Hold et øye med tilstanden til motoren, dekk og selv hvor mye plass har du i bagasjerommet. Hver lille brikke må repareres Når den blir ødelagt.

Du vil kunne oppgradere kjøretøyet og forbedre ytelsen. Tilstanden til din Laika og mengden av fraktet Last vil avgjøre hvordan bilen oppfører seg på veien. Den Prosedyremessig genererte verden vil forberede ulike utfordringer for deg og din Laika. Når du tar vare på bilen, må du ikke glemme deg selv. Den lange reisen krever pauser og din mentale tilstand som sjåfør er like viktig som det tekniske aspektet av kjøretøyet. Husk å stoppe i veikanten moteller for å få litt skikkelig hvile.
Reis tilbake i tid

Bortsett fra den typiske simulering, tilbyr spillet noe mer: den økonomiske aspektet. Jalopy spillet finner sted i begynnelsen av 90-tallet av xx århundre i Øst-Europa. Jernteppet har nettopp falt og kapitalismen begynner å blomstre i ex-kommunistiske land. Du står fritt til å reise hvor du vil. Din oppgave er å handle ulike varer medborgere som ønsker å gjøre bruk av den nylig fødte kapitalismen og tjene penger på frihandel.

Du vil slå ulike avtaler som vil tillate deg å bli kongen av den tidlige kapitalismen i Øst-Europa. Beware skjønt, som alt er ikke så lett som det ser ut-er det fortsatt grense sjekker og noen ganger må du skjule fra politiet og bare smuglervarer som de importerer til noen land er ulovlig.
Historie & oppsummering

Spillet har en historie som starter med onkel av karakteren ber ham om å reise gjennom Øst-Europa. Underveis forteller onkel ulike historier som kommer fra kommunistiske ganger. Den spesifikke Vibe av gamle tider bak Iron Curtain kan merkes. Men den viktigste delen er gameplay som er en blanding av kjøring simulering og eventyr spill i merkelige økonomiske omgivelser.

Spillet ble utviklet av Greg Pryjmachuk som pleide å jobbe for formel 1 franchise mellom 2009 og 2014. Siden slutten av 2014-tallet begynte han å arbeide på sitt eget simuleringsspill med bilen designet basert på øst-Tysklands berømte Trabbie. Jalopy (PC) ble utgitt av Excalibur Games og produsert av Minskworks.
Kategorier: Sim Games, Indie Games, Adventure Games, Racing Games, Adventure, Simulation
Attributt 2 verdi(er): Excalibur Games, Excalibur Publishing, Contact Sales Limited
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Sim Games, Indie Games, Adventure Games, Racing Games, Adventure, Simulation

Beskrivelse:
Midnight Club: Los Angeles is set in the city of Los Angeles, again providing an option to completely free-roam (in an open world environment larger than all the three cities combined from the previous game, Midnight Club 3: Dub Edition). New additions are a 24-hour day-to-night cycle, weather effects and traffic with licensed vehicles, adding a realistic aspect to the game. The new dynamic weather system has been reported to alter the gameplay experience, making the vehicle more prone to sliding on slick surfaces. If any damage is inflicted upon a vehicle after races, the player does not necessarily need to drive back to a garage for a full repair, but, instead, can choose the "Quick Fix" option through which old, junkyard-esque parts will be added to the car. To get back that "nice, new car look", the player must actually drive back to repair their vehicle at a garage or gas station. This also means that totaling a vehicle is only possible within a single race or event. With the RAGE system being used for this game, traffic levels fluctuate throughout the day, with light traffic at night, heavy traffic in the morning and afternoon, and heaviest traffic in the evenings. Motorcycles are again part of the game, including the Ducati 999R and the Kawasaki Ninja ZX-14. Convertible cars, customizable interiors, in-game photo mode, and customizable exotics are all new additions. Developers placed great emphasis on the elimination of load screens, stating that the player could literally jump from career mode to an online race in under ten seconds.

Los Angeles is said to be the longest of the four Midnight Club games, with more than ten different types of races including series races, tournaments, pink slip races, and freeway races. For most of these races, players must race an opponent to the start line in order to earn extra rep (a leveling system used to determine the player's skill in the game) before the actual race begins, although this can be skipped. Races have four difficulties: easiest, medium, hard, and hardest. These difficulties are color-coded with green being easiest, yellow being medium, orange being hard, and red being hardest. Each successive difficulty of race has greater rewards than the former.
Kategorier: Racing, open-world
Attributt 2 verdi(er): Rockstar Games, Take-Two Interactive, Softclub, Sony Interactive Entertainment
Attributt 5 verdi(er): Racing, open-world

Beskrivelse:
The LEGO Movie

Join Emmet and an unlikely group of resistance fighters in their heroic quest to thwart Lord Business’ evil plans—a mission that Emmet is hopelessly and hilariously unprepared for.  It’s a wild ride with a surprising mix of over 90 playable characters including Batman, Superman, Wonder Woman, the Green Ninja, Gandalf, Shakespeare, Cleopatra and more.

Beskrivelse:
Narcos: Rise of the Cartels

Welcome to Colombia, 1980’s - the fires of El Patrón's empire have been lit, its influence spanning borders, and expansion unabated. Influence and corruption is rife; cops, guards, politicians and those in between are falling into the pocket of the Medellín Cartel, and after years of production, America is finally taking notice.

Narcos: Rise of the Cartels tells the story of the hit Netflix TV series, of the rise and fall of El Patrón. Choose your side and ally with the DEA or conversely side with the Narcos. Explore recognisable locations from the show and take a role in pivotal world-altering events and battles that will define and shift the war on drugs.

Form your team from a variety of class-specific roles, join leading characters, upgrade your skills and take part in brutal turn-based combat, where your actions will have consequence.

Plata o Plomo?

Beskrivelse:
Mr.President!

Mr.President! Can you take a bullet for the soon to be President of the United States of America?! You play as Dick “Rock-Hard” Johnson a bulletproof man, the best bodyguard money can buy. He is sworn to protect the most hated presidential candidate of all time Ronald Rump.

Liberal media has rigged the election and tarnished his glowing public image, now they are trying to end his life. You need to leap, flip, fling, roll, and many other verbs to get in between Rump and certain death. If Rump dies, Who is going to pay for your Netflix sub? How are you going to pay for your lifetime of student loans or over inflated medical bills? Where will you get the money for another dumb physics game? YOU BETTER SAVE THE MAN OR YOU DON'T GET THE MONEY! It is your American duty to protect, serve, and live by the mighty dollar, because money is the only true sign of someone’s worth.
Kategorier: Actionspill, Indie-spill, Adventure, Simulation

Beskrivelse:
Ships 2017

Take control over 3 special purpose naval vessels. Complete various missions on dangerous waters of Baltic Sea.
Take part in recovery of objects from the bottom of the sea. Transport heavy cargo to its final destination, also including rescue and transport missions. Assemble massive naval installations on open waters.

Take control over the ship crew and their accessories (such as fire extinguishers, fire hoses, water cannons, inflatables and searchlights) in order to defend your ship against pirate attack, to extinguish fire on board or to pick survivors in a special game mode.

    3 special purpose vessels

    24 interesting missions

    ship renovation system

    crew management mode

    realistic water thanks to the advanced graphics and physics engine

Beskrivelse:
Monster Jam Steel Titans

Real Trucks. Real Action. Monster Jam! Monster Jam Steel Titans delivers the complete Monster Jam experience for everybody to enjoy!

All the trucks, stunts, stadiums, racing and massive air in one game!

Play in various game modes including Stadium and outdoor Racing, various Stunt Challenges and Destruction modes!

    Drive a MONSTER! Compete with 25 of the most popular trucks including Grave Digger and Max-D!
    Total destruction including breaking body panels, deforming junker cars as well as demolishing the environment!
    Perform your favorite stunts! Bicycles, Stoppies, Moonwalks, Walk Its, Cyclones, Pogos, Power Outs and Back-Flips!
    Hear the roar of huge crowds inside 12 stadiums packed with fans on your road to the Monster Jam World Finals!
    Explore and smash through the environment in a Massive Outdoor World!
    Train just like your favorite Monster Jam pro driver at Monster Jam University!

Beskrivelse:
Pang Adventures

The Pang series is a beloved collection of arcade video games from the early 90s. Guide two brothers on a quest around the world to save humankind from a massive alien invasion! Use your wits and skills to overcome the attack balls pouring from the skies and rescue the world’s cities and landmarks from impending annihilation!

Pang Adventures brings new features and gameplay to this arcade legend while keeping true to the original spirit of the series.

The simplest recipes make the best cookies! Pang Adventures is one delicious treat specifically designed to please your digital tastebuds and get you hooked! So keep your eyes peeled and your reflexes razor sharp to succeed and save the world!

    Local Co-op: Adventures are best shared! The couch-coop feature is available in every game mode, allowing friends and family to team up and save the world!
    Online Co-op: show off your skills and compete with your worldwide friends to see who can down the most balls!
    3 different ball-popping modes:
    More than 100 levels scattered throughout Antarctica, Scotland, Death Valley, Bora Bora... each location with its own unique tricks and twists!
    The Pang Bros. have upgraded their gear since the last alien invasion: machine guns, flamethrowers, lasers, shurikens…you name it, they've got it!
    Boss fights! For the first time in the series, the Pang Brothers come face-to-face with the nefarious Alien Commanders! These villains didn't come to Earth for the sightseeing…so get ready to blow them to smithereens!
    Since the last invasion, the Aliens have been busy improving their attack ball technology! Electric, explosive, smoke and lava balls will all be deployed to knock you off your feet, so be prepared!
